content: to twist your sts work *k1 p1 repeat from * for 1 5 or desired length leg pattern for leg and foot change to mc *k3 p1 work pattern until sock measure 3 from cast on edge or desired length heel flap change to cc2 worked over first 32 sts half of your cast on stitches row 1 rs *sl 1 purlwise with yarn in back k1 repeat across row row 2 ws sl 1 purlwise with yarn in front purl across remaining row repeat row 1 & 2 a total of 16 times the last two row above count as one repeat you will end with a total of 32 row heel turn row 1 rs sl 1 purlwise with yarn in back k16 ssk k1 turn row 2 ws sl 1 purlwise with yarn in front p3 p2tog p1 turn row 3 sl 1 purlwise with yarn in back knit to 1 stitch before gap ssk k1 turn row 4 sl 1 purlwise with yarn in front purl to 1 stitch before gap p2tog p1 turn repeat row 3 & 4 until all stitches on the heel have been worked you will end after your last ws row and have 18 sts left gusset change to mc knit across the row using the same needle pick up 16 sts along the side of the heel flap pick up 1 extra stitch in corner to prevent any holes knit across the instep stitches pick up 1 extra stitch in the corner then pick up 16 sts along the other side of the heel flap knit the next 9 sts from the 1st needle you are now at the beginning of the round gusset decrease round 1 knit round 2 k to 3 sts before the instep begins k2tog k1 knit across instep sts k1 ssk knit to end of round repeat these two rounds until you have the original 64 sts 3 the lea socks knitting pattern by deb buckingham @knit on designs llc foot once you are back to your original stitch count of 64 continue working the leg pattern until the length measures 1 5 2 shorter than your desired foot length i wear a us 8 size shoe and my foot measures 9 5 long hint measure your foot from the back of the heel to the tip of your longest toe i begin shaping for the toe once my work measured 7 5 from the back of the heel your heel and toe take approximately 1 5 2 of your foot length the craft yarn council has issued the following length guidelines for the foot of the sock measuring from the back of the heel to the end of the longest toes all are us sizes women s shoe sizes 4-6 5 8 9 20 23 cm women s shoe sizes 7-9 5 9 25 10 23 25 5 cm women s shoe sizes 10-12 5 10 25 11 26 28 cm men s shoe
